title: iRobot Roomba® 800 Series - How To Select Cleaning Mode
description: iRobot Roomba® 800 Series - How To Select Cleaning Mode

asset.title: iRobot Roomba® 800 Series - How To Select Cleaning Mode
asset.description: iRobot Roomba® 800 Series - How To Select Cleaning Mode
asset.author: iRobot

transcripts: Roomba cleans based on the cleaning mode you select Roomba has three cleaning modes in clean mode Roomba automatically calculates the room size and adjust it's cleaning time appropriately. In spot mode Roomba spirals approximately three feet in diameter and then spirals back to where it started intensely cleaning a localized area press the spot button to start this mode. In scheduled cleaning mode Roomba leaves its home base at the specified time, cleans and then returns to the home base to recharge when it's done.
